verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%>
"Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H3068><s%> 'I am Yahweh your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall not do <S%H6213><s%> as they do <S%H4639><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> where you lived: <S%H3427><s%> and you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> as they do <S%H6213><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> where I am bringing <S%H935><s%> you; <S%H3212><s%> neither shall you walk in their statutes. <S%H2708><s%>
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and walk <S%H3212><s%> in them: <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh your God. <S%H430><s%>

You shall therefore keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%> and my ordinances; <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> if a man <S%H120><s%> does, <S%H6213><s%> he shall live <S%H2425><s%> in them: <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh.

<S%H7126><s%>"'None of you shall approach anyone <S%H376><s%> who are his close <S%H7607><s%> relatives, <S%H1320><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> their nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> nor the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your mother: <S%H517><s%> she is your mother. <S%H517><s%> You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s wife: <S%H802><s%> it is your father <S%H1><s%>'s nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your sister, <S%H269><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your father, <S%H1><s%> or the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of your mother, <S%H517><s%> whether born <S%H4138><s%> at home, <S%H1004><s%> or born <S%H4138><s%> abroad. <S%H2351><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your son <S%H1121><s%>'s daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or of your daughter <S%H1323><s%>'s daughter, <S%H1323><s%> even their nakedness: <S%H6172><s%> for theirs <S%H2007><s%> is your own nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s wife <S%H802><s%>'s daughter, <S%H1323><s%> conceived <S%H4138><s%> by your father, <S%H1><s%> since she is your sister. <S%H269><s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s sister: <S%H269><s%> she is your father <S%H1><s%>'s near kinswoman. <S%H7607><s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your mother <S%H517><s%>'s sister: <S%H269><s%> for she is your mother <S%H517><s%>'s near kinswoman. <S%H7607><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>'s brother, <S%H251><s%> you shall not approach <S%H7126><s%> his wife: <S%H802><s%> she is your aunt. <S%H1733><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your daughter-in <S%H1121><s%>-law: she is your son's wife. <S%H802><s%> You shall not uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>
<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of your brother <S%H251><s%>'s wife: <S%H802><s%> it is your brother <S%H251><s%>'s nakedness. <S%H6172><s%>

<S%H1540><s%>"'You shall not uncover the nakedness <S%H6172><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> and her daughter. <S%H1323><s%> You shall not take <S%H3947><s%> her son <S%H1121><s%>'s daughter, <S%H1323><s%> or her daughter <S%H1323><s%>'s daughter, <S%H1323><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness; <S%H6172><s%> they are near kinswomen: <S%H7608><s%> it is wickedness. <S%H2154><s%>

<S%H3947><s%>"'You shall not take a wife <S%H802><s%> to her sister, <S%H269><s%> to be a rival, <S%H6887><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> while her sister is yet alive. <S%H2416><s%>
<S%H7126><s%>"'You shall not approach a woman <S%H802><s%> to uncover <S%H1540><s%> her nakedness, <S%H6172><s%> as long as she is impure <S%H5079><s%> by her uncleanness. <S%H2932><s%>
<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not lie <S%H7903><s%> carnally <S%H2233><s%> with your neighbor <S%H5997><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> and defile yourself with her. <S%H2930><s%>

<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not give any of your children <S%H2233><s%> to sacrifice <S%H5674><s%> to Molech; <S%H4432><s%> neither shall you profane <S%H2490><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of your God: <S%H430><s%> I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
<S%H7901><s%>"'You shall not lie with a man, <S%H2145><s%> as with <S%H4904><s%> a woman. <S%H802><s%> That is detestable. <S%H8441><s%>

<S%H5414><s%>"'You shall not lie <S%H7903><s%> with any animal <S%H929><s%> to defile <S%H2930><s%> yourself with it; <S%H802><s%> neither shall any woman give <S%H5975><s%> herself <S%H6440><s%> to an animal, <S%H929><s%> to lie down <S%H7250><s%> with it: <S%H8397><s%> it is a perversion.

<S%H2930><s%>"'Don't defile yourselves in any of these things: <S%H428><s%> for in all these the nations <S%H1471><s%> which I am casting out <S%H7971><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you were defiled. <S%H2930><s%>
The land <S%H776><s%> was defiled: <S%H2930><s%> therefore I punished <S%H6485><s%> its iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> vomited out <S%H6958><s%> her inhabitants. <S%H3427><s%>

You therefore shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my statutes <S%H2708><s%> and my ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> and shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any of these abominations; <S%H8441><s%> neither the native-born, <S%H249><s%> nor the stranger <S%H1616><s%> who lives as a foreigner <S%H1616><s%> among you; <S%H8432><s%>

(for all these <S%H411><s%> abominations <S%H8441><s%> have the men <S%H582><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> done, <S%H6213><s%> that were before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H776><s%> and the land became defiled <S%H2930><s%>);
that the land <S%H776><s%> not vomit you out <S%H6958><s%> also, <S%H2930><s%> when you defile it, <S%H6958><s%> as it vomited out the nation <S%H1471><s%> that was before you. <S%H6440><s%>

<S%H6213><s%>"'For whoever shall do any of these abominations, <S%H8441><s%> even the souls <S%H5315><s%> that do <S%H6213><s%> them shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> their people. <S%H5971><s%>

Therefore you shall keep <S%H8104><s%> my requirements, <S%H4931><s%> that you do not practice <S%H6213><s%> any of these abominable <S%H8441><s%> customs, <S%H2708><s%> which were practiced <S%H6213><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H2930><s%> and that you do not defile yourselves with them: <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh your God. <S%H430><s%>'"
